title: Trio of Asian dipping sauces
directions: To a small mixing bowl add the honey, sesame oil and vinegar and soy sauce.
Pour into serving bowl and top with ginger and sesame seeds.
To a small mixing bowl, add the soy sauce, chili sauce and honey.
Pour into serving bowl and top with green onions and sesame seeds.
To a small mixing bowl add the hoisin sauce, peanut butter, soy sauce and ½ teaspoon hot water .
Add more water if peanut butter is too thick.
Pour into serving bowl and top with chopped peanuts.
ingredients: Fresh ginger, cut into small slivers
2 teaspoons chili sauce (more or less depending how spicy you like)
